trans-unit.source: Provides a notification mechanism for a tracking service to inform the runtime tracking infrastructure about changes to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> for a particular workflow <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: 提供通知機制，讓追蹤服務通知執行階段追蹤基礎結構有關的變更<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"> </xref> <xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type>特定工作流程

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Tracking services manage the tracking profiles available to the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]追蹤服務會管理執行階段追蹤基礎結構的追蹤設定檔。

trans-unit.source: A tracking service that implements IProfileNotification can provide notifications to the runtime tracking infrastructure when a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for a particular workflow <xref:System.Type> either changes or is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: 實作 IProfileNotification 追蹤服務可以提供執行階段追蹤基礎結構的通知時<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>針對特定工作流程<xref:System.Type>變更或已不再有效。</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure subscribes to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileRemoved> events and updates its cache when these events are raised.
trans-unit.target: 執行階段追蹤基礎結構會訂閱<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>和<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileRemoved>事件，會引發這些事件時，更新其快取。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileRemoved> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>

trans-unit.source: This decreases the number of requests for tracking profiles that the runtime tracking infrastructure makes to a tracking service.
trans-unit.target: 這樣會降低追蹤設定檔的執行階段追蹤基礎結構向追蹤服務提出的要求數目。

trans-unit.source: Note: the runtime tracking infrastructure still uses the overloaded <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.GetProfile%2A> methods of the tracking service, but it does not call them as frequently.
trans-unit.target: 注意︰ 執行階段追蹤基礎結構仍會使用多載<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.GetProfile%2A>方法追蹤服務，但它不會呼叫它們的頻率。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.GetProfile%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> for a specific workflow Type is removed.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>特定工作流程類型已移除。

trans-unit.source: A tracking service can raise the ProfileRemoved event to inform the runtime tracking infrastructure that new instances of the workflow <xref:System.Type> specified in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs> should not be tracked.
trans-unit.target: 追蹤服務可以引發以通知執行階段追蹤基礎結構 ProfileRemoved 事件工作流程的新執行個體<xref:System.Type>中所指定<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs>不應該追蹤。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref> for a specific workflow <xref:System.Type> is updated.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile"></xref>特定工作流程<xref:System.Type>會更新。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A tracking service can raise the ProfileUpdated event to inform the runtime tracking infrastructure that a new <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> is available for the indicated workflow <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: 追蹤服務可以引發 ProfileUpdated 事件，以通知執行階段追蹤基礎結構可<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>供指定的工作流程<xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>新

trans-unit.source: The workflow <xref:System.Type> and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> are passed in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs>.
